可變電阻模組，控制六顆燈泡漸亮漸暗

pot/4	li0	li1	li2	li3	li4	li5
0		255	204	153	102	51	0
51		204	255	204	153	102	51
102		153	204	255	204	153	102
153		102	153	204	255	204	153
204		51	102	153	204	255	204
255		0	51	102	153	204	255

燈		PWM	rule
light0	D3	255-|0-pot|
light1	D5	255-|51-pot|
light2	D6	255-|102-pot|
light3	D9	255-|153-pot|
light4	D10	255-|204-pot|
light5	D11	255-|255-pot|
